plot: Death sentence to oblivion. However, after 70 years of the death of the enigmatic poet Porfirio Barba Jacob, his spirit and essence still living in his hometown Santa Rosa de Osos and in some of its inhabitants
title: La sombra del poeta
plot_es: Death sentence to oblivion. However, after 70 years of the death of the enigmatic poet Porfirio Barba Jacob, his spirit and essence still living in his hometown Santa Rosa de Osos and in some of its inhabitants
